H3.text: most of new zealands land supports which economic activity. agriculture

A4.text: As a large island nation New Zealand has abundant natural resources and mineral wealth.

A5.text: The primary sector continues to dominate New Zealand's exports, despite accounting for only 7% of GDP as of 2024.

A6.text: Agriculture is the largest sector of the tradable economy.

A7.text: The country exported NZ$46.4 billion worth of agricultural products (raw and manufactured) in the 12 months to June 2019, 79.6% of the country's total exported goods.
